Memo Sample ( for Visual Basic)

Location: mssdk\samples\Multimedia\VBSamples\DSound\src\memo

__________________________________________________________________


Contents:

- Requirements
__________________________________________________________________

REQUIREMENTS:

This application will show how to save and retrieve sound information
from a MSACCESS database.  In order to use this application you
will need to have MDAC installed on your system.

Visual Basic 5 and 6 include MDAC.
You can also install MDAC from http://www.microsoft.com/data/
